blog.name: keep-a-bucket-full-of-stars
blog.title: IronDad and His SpiderSon
blog.description: Leah // 20 // Buckets_Of_Stars // Bisexual ~~ INTJ ~~ Cancer ~~ Slytherin // ANTI-ST*RKER // 😊 - AO3 - Instagram - Buy Me A Ko-Fi? - Twitter

title: Endgame Headcanon:
body:
So, you know how, when Peter uh well um dies  he crumples in parts?? like his hands and legs go first and then his chest and head??

well, what if, when he comes back, he reforms in reverse. Like everyone else is already reformed that was on Titan and Tony is just sitting there, looking around for him cause his kid is coming back, Peter will be here any minute, he’s coming home its okay now, everything is okay 

and then he sees a familiar foot start to reform right in front of him and then a hand and then there is a delay and Tony just immediately springs up and pushes people aside and hovers his now shaking hands over the slowly reforming body of his kid.

Peter chest and head finally form after about 5 minutes, and Tony is there the whole time and while crying really really hard gently holds his son close and presses kisses against his head and Peter’s first moments back on Earth and back alive is in the safety of Tony’s arms.

Tagging some peeps: @abyssal-glory @riseuplikeglitterandgold @itsthwippingtime @wordscorrupt @loubuttons @starkaroos2034  @spiderboyneedsahug @marvelbased @gennyld  @agentmorganb-006 @justme–emily @peterneedsahugparker @determinedpines  @irondad-not-ironsad @sup-dickwad @softirondad  @mmmmmmmmmchicken @delphinium2  @theofficaldeannawinchester @baloobird  @totallynotanartblog @nefariouscryptid @steamypanda  @she-loves-her-queens-of-whump  @prolixology  @iloveyoupeterparker @iamanunusuallady

summary:
Any villain: Three million dollars or else Captain America will die!
Tony: Oh man. That’s way too high. You got like a discount...
body:
Any villain: Three million dollars or else Captain America will die!


Tony: Oh man. That’s way too high. You got like a discount or anything like that?

blog.name: buckyusuallytopstony
blog.title: Something Clever
blog.description:
Shipping Tony Stark with happiness.

WinterIron/Stuckony/Stony slut... mainly WinterIron tho.

tags: tony stark deserves all the love
bucky barnes deserves all the love
summary:
Tony is giving Bucky a miniature robot for Valentine’s Day and Bucky is knitting Tony a scarf with the Iron Man colors. 
Bucky...
body:
Tony is giving Bucky a miniature robot for Valentine’s Day and Bucky is knitting Tony a scarf with the Iron Man colors.

Bucky walks around with Bae-B cradled in his arms whenever he needs to go somewhere in the tower and Bae-B snaps his small claw at anyone, who isn’t Bucky, that tries to pick him up.

Tony wears his scarf everywhere. Charity gala? (“Who are you wearing, Mr. Stark?” “Well right now I’m wearing James, but later he’ll be wearing me.”) Definitely. Interviews? Yup. Summer? 100%. The only time he doesn’t wear it is when he’s in his workshop or in battle.

You can’t fucking fight me on this.

You can’t fucking fight me on this.

blog.name: scavengingforwords
blog.title:
Fandom!
(largely Marvel Fandom)
blog.description: I'm a nerd who gets sucked into tons of fandoms, here is where I will gather my fandom love. Let’s be honest though, at this point this is like 99.99% Marvel and of that percentage 99% of it is Avengers Academy related.

blog.name: okay-stark
blog.title: We’re in the Endgame now
blog.description:
Tony Stark is That Bitch™

Feel free to ask me anything

•Serena•

I’m trying okay.

summary:
Everyone: You’re going to get yourself killed
Tony: Listen the only person whose allowed to kill me is me. If you think I’ve...
body:
Everyone: You’re going to get yourself killed

Tony: Listen the only person whose allowed to kill me is me. If you think I’ve lived this long for someone else to steal my kill you’re fucking wrong.

Everyone: That’s not the attitude we were fucking looking for.

Everyone: That’s not the attitude we were fucking looking for.

summary:
Peter Parker jokingly getting Tony Stark one of those ‘best dad in the world’ mugs.
Tony chokes up, threatens to blaster Pepper...
body:
Peter Parker jokingly getting Tony Stark one of those ‘best dad in the world’ mugs.

Tony chokes up, threatens to blaster Pepper in the face if she keeps laughing at him.

Tony refusing any drink made for him, including scotch, if it isn’t in the mug Peter got him.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: tonystanktableforone
blog.title: tony stank table for one
blog.description: 18. Desi. Everything Tony Stark. This blog doesn't invite discourse. Also on AO3. Donate/Commission something on my kofi to support me!

tags: i'm sorry this took so long
also this got much longer than i expected it
it kind of ran away from me
fade to black ot3 smexy times
cuz i dk how to write smexy times
summary: Prompt 2? With tony saying it? And maybe stuckony? Unless you don't like that ship than just good ol' fashioned stony!
question: Prompt 2? With tony saying it? And maybe stuckony? Unless you don't like that ship than just good ol' fashioned stony!
answer:
#2: you think you’re so smart? what’s my middle name?

–

i’m really sorry this took so long but i kind of struggled with how to write it

–

also i tried to make it stuckony but i’m not actually quite sure if i’ve succeeded 

–

crack treated seriously so take this ficlet with a grain of salt

–

The first thing everyone needed to know about Tony Stark was that he was very very smart

like

graduated  MIT with 2 doctorates at 19 smart

rediscovered an element from a theme-park model smart

built a miniature arc reactor in a cave with a box of scraps smart

The second thing everyone needed to know about Tony Stark was that he was very very dumb

like

somehow wasn’t aware that Rhodey switched out his MIT hoodie every 5 years dumb

burned water on multiple occasions dumb

and most recently, was completely oblivious to the fact that he was dating 2 super soldiers dumb

–

It started like this

Steve brought his bestfriend back to the Tower looking like a two-bit hobo, Tony took one look at him, and parade-marched him into a shower

He completely ignored all laws about basic human privacy, and instead bathed and dried down Barnes, dressed him in clothes he’d pulled out of Steve’s closets and put the Winter Soldier to bed like he was a 5 year old child, complete with italian nursery rhymes and a bedtime story about America’s great soldier Captain America

It was the beginning of an arduous trek to recovery, and Tony’s blatant choice to wilfully ignore everything scary about Barnes did wonders

Barnes became James (and Winter Wonderland and Frosty and on one memorable occasion, Buckaboo) and he got better

And with him, so did Steve

Steve stopped mournfully staring at empty walls and started going on runs, canvasing museums and took up art with a new vengeance

Under Tony’s careful prodding and incessant need to insert himself into everything, the team watched the Brooklyn duo come alive again

(its honestly no wonder that they fell in love with him)

–

It continued something like this

Natasha watched Steve and Yasha flit around the kitchen preparing breakfast for Tony, lay it out on the table in approximately 5 separate ways before he stumbled out of the workshop and then promptly collapsing against the counter in exhaustion

Bruce watched as Steve left small post-it sketches all over the lab and Tony’s responding giggles everytime he found a new one, and was greeted to the sight of James staring abashedly at Tony’s ass when he was seated on his lap, fiddling with the metal arm

Clint raged when James threw minute pieces of spaghetti at the back of neck during Mario Kart sessions with Tony, distracting him long enough to let Tony win and then throw himself into James’ arms in glee

–

It ended something like this:

Tony’s date with Helen Cho made front page news in 4 newspapers and several other magazines and tabloids

–

Tony’s broken out of his post-scienceing glow by a particularly loud bang against his workshop desk

He looks up to the angry (has James been crying?) faces of his two favourite Brooklyn boys, down to the newspaper on his table (that really is a bad angle for him) and back to them

“Can I help you?” he asks when nothing is forthcoming

“You-” Steve splutters, “This is how you- there are better ways to break up with us Tony!”

“Okay back up what?”

“Finding out about your girl on the side on the front page of the Times isn’t a fun experience doll,” James intones and Tony knows he’s in trouble but frankly he’s having a hard time wrapping his head around this

“Wait no what? Break up?”

“We were never together!!”

“We’ve been dating for 6 months!”

Tony crosses his arms, “If I was fucking you and James I would’ve noticed Steve. As it happens, my ass isn’t sore.”

“Tony did you genuinely not know we’ve been dating this entire time?”

“Doll we’ve been in love with you forever, and we thought you felt the same way”

“In love?” Tony’s brain is short-circuiting fast, “You barely know anything about me! How can you be in love with me?”

“We’ve been living together for 2 years, I feel like we know enough”

“You think you’re so smart? what’s my middle name?”

“Edward”

fuck

“Favourite fruit”

“Blueberries”

“Favourite flower”

“Trick question, you hate flowers”

Tony slumps back in his seat, face aghast, “we’ve been- and I never- why haven’t we kissed yet?”

James and Steve shrug, 

“We figured you wanted to take it slow, and we didn’t wanna push”

“I just got comfortable with physical touch doll, no way I was gonna try something until I was sure you were comfortable”

“You really didn’t know we were dating?”

Tony shakes his head softly

“6 months huh?”

“So, that means we must’ve crossed the third date”

Steve nods, “Yeah way back in Mar-” 

the rest of his words are cut off by the harsh press of Tony’s lips against his

(there isn’t much talking after that)

Fin

#2: you think you’re so smart? what’s my middle name?

Tony slumps back in his seat, face aghast, “we’ve been- and I never- why haven’t we kissed yet?”

James and Steve shrug, 

“We figured you wanted to take it slow, and we didn’t wanna push”

“I just got comfortable with physical touch doll, no way I was gonna try something until I was sure you were comfortable”

“You really didn’t know we were dating?”

Tony shakes his head softly

“6 months huh?”

“So, that means we must’ve crossed the third date”

Steve nods, “Yeah way back in Mar-” 

the rest of his words are cut off by the harsh press of Tony’s lips against his

(there isn’t much talking after that)

Fin
trail.content:
#2: you think you’re so smart? what’s my middle name?

–

i’m really sorry this took so long but i kind of struggled with how to write it

–

also i tried to make it stuckony but i’m not actually quite sure if i’ve succeeded 

–

crack treated seriously so take this ficlet with a grain of salt

–

The first thing everyone needed to know about Tony Stark was that he was very very smart

like

graduated  MIT with 2 doctorates at 19 smart

rediscovered an element from a theme-park model smart

built a miniature arc reactor in a cave with a box of scraps smart

The second thing everyone needed to know about Tony Stark was that he was very very dumb

like

somehow wasn’t aware that Rhodey switched out his MIT hoodie every 5 years dumb

burned water on multiple occasions dumb

and most recently, was completely oblivious to the fact that he was dating 2 super soldiers dumb

–

It started like this

Steve brought his bestfriend back to the Tower looking like a two-bit hobo, Tony took one look at him, and parade-marched him into a shower

He completely ignored all laws about basic human privacy, and instead bathed and dried down Barnes, dressed him in clothes he’d pulled out of Steve’s closets and put the Winter Soldier to bed like he was a 5 year old child, complete with italian nursery rhymes and a bedtime story about America’s great soldier Captain America

It was the beginning of an arduous trek to recovery, and Tony’s blatant choice to wilfully ignore everything scary about Barnes did wonders

Barnes became James (and Winter Wonderland and Frosty and on one memorable occasion, Buckaboo) and he got better

And with him, so did Steve

Steve stopped mournfully staring at empty walls and started going on runs, canvasing museums and took up art with a new vengeance

Under Tony’s careful prodding and incessant need to insert himself into everything, the team watched the Brooklyn duo come alive again

(its honestly no wonder that they fell in love with him)

–

It continued something like this

Natasha watched Steve and Yasha flit around the kitchen preparing breakfast for Tony, lay it out on the table in approximately 5 separate ways before he stumbled out of the workshop and then promptly collapsing against the counter in exhaustion

Bruce watched as Steve left small post-it sketches all over the lab and Tony’s responding giggles everytime he found a new one, and was greeted to the sight of James staring abashedly at Tony’s ass when he was seated on his lap, fiddling with the metal arm

Clint raged when James threw minute pieces of spaghetti at the back of neck during Mario Kart sessions with Tony, distracting him long enough to let Tony win and then throw himself into James’ arms in glee

–

It ended something like this:

Tony’s date with Helen Cho made front page news in 4 newspapers and several other magazines and tabloids

–

Tony’s broken out of his post-scienceing glow by a particularly loud bang against his workshop desk

He looks up to the angry (has James been crying?) faces of his two favourite Brooklyn boys, down to the newspaper on his table (that really is a bad angle for him) and back to them

“Can I help you?” he asks when nothing is forthcoming

“You-” Steve splutters, “This is how you- there are better ways to break up with us Tony!”

“Okay back up what?”

“Finding out about your girl on the side on the front page of the Times isn’t a fun experience doll,” James intones and Tony knows he’s in trouble but frankly he’s having a hard time wrapping his head around this

“Wait no what? Break up?”

“We were never together!!”

“We’ve been dating for 6 months!”

Tony crosses his arms, “If I was fucking you and James I would’ve noticed Steve. As it happens, my ass isn’t sore.”

“Tony did you genuinely not know we’ve been dating this entire time?”

“Doll we’ve been in love with you forever, and we thought you felt the same way”

“In love?” Tony’s brain is short-circuiting fast, “You barely know anything about me! How can you be in love with me?”

“We’ve been living together for 2 years, I feel like we know enough”

“You think you’re so smart? what’s my middle name?”

“Edward”

fuck

“Favourite fruit”

“Blueberries”

“Favourite flower”

“Trick question, you hate flowers”

Tony slumps back in his seat, face aghast, “we’ve been- and I never- why haven’t we kissed yet?”

James and Steve shrug, 

“We figured you wanted to take it slow, and we didn’t wanna push”

“I just got comfortable with physical touch doll, no way I was gonna try something until I was sure you were comfortable”

“You really didn’t know we were dating?”

Tony shakes his head softly

“6 months huh?”

“So, that means we must’ve crossed the third date”

Steve nods, “Yeah way back in Mar-” 

the rest of his words are cut off by the harsh press of Tony’s lips against his

(there isn’t much talking after that)

Fin

blog.description:
**ADULTS ONLY- NO EXCEPTIONS.** IF IT IS TAGGED #RPPOST DO NOT REBLOG IT UNLESS YOU ARE WHO I AM RPING WITH. No warning- only block if that happens. 
21+ No minors. Only adult human disasters, please. |Multiship|Comics and MCU friendly RPer|Open to discuss most any idea|Kink positive RP possible| Mostly ship-posting and shit posting for non-rp posts. Abilist bs can get bent. Terfs can too. HoH mun and muse. Sign language will be used just like English(IE in quotes without funky tildas or the like) - and because I am the milk of human kindness, I will translate ALL other languages out in proper American English grammar unlike the hash people make ""Translating"" stuff into ~italics~ (Or google translate). You're welcome. Rules is blog/rules - Read it before interacting. OCs welcome* and Mun is They/Them, Muse is He/Him.

tags: Loving how easy it is to make stories
title: qink
excerpt: Doing a kinky CYOA over on qink - Tony gets the power to change things, pre IM1. He gets unlimited cosmic power- to get one deep dark dream made reality. It goes as well as expected.
description:
Literally I just, started typing to see what I could make. 

So far- I adore this Kinky Alt to Tumblr. (my blog there- https://app.qink.co/blog/deafnotblind )

They literally opened a few hours ago- so most blog names are WIDE open. 

They’re working on allowing gifs in text posts and multiple image img posts. They have a super robust story system, and for a platform in Alpha, I am LOVING it. 

The customer support team are super excited to see what the RPC can make with their CYOA stuff. And the Stories as a whole are really being underused, despite being the closest to beta out of everything in the site. 

Some features planned: 

The ability to, as you choose, directly monetize some content (hello fanartists) by locking some posts/stories behind a per blog membership.

The ability to set up “tasks” and to do lists, keep track of commissions and requests real time, set reminders… all sorts of nifty tools for RPC folks. 

They are 18+ minimum age, and kink and trans friendly. 

I will be working on this little story when I’ve time, and playing around with new features as they come… but, I just thought that this sort of site might be interesting for folks to explore, and help shape into a perfect Kink and Adult RPC haven.

blog.name: savedbythenotepad
blog.title: Silver Linings
blog.description: hey what up i'm precious, 21 and i'm constantly screaming・ twitter・ao3

summary: Du write ironhusbands?? maybe 24 for them??
question: Du write ironhusbands?? maybe 24 for them??
answer:
24. “Dude. It’s 3am. What the hell?”

I do and this was fun to write as I imagined them in their MIT days which is always a blast. ^^ I hope you like it!

“Hey, honey bear?”

Tony’s voice was loud in the small space of their dorm and he didn’t even bother to whisper. It somehow managed to pull Rhodey from his sweet dreams, his brow furrowing in mild frustration. He tried to fall back to sleep in hopes that Tony didn’t notice the change in his breathing. He hoped that Tony took his rustling around as him simply moving in his sleep, trying to find a comfortable position.

But Tony was too smart for his own damn good and the next words to leave his mouth were I know you’re awake. There was an amused lilt to his tone which showed that he carried little sympathy for waking Rhodey up but there was still time to claw this back. He shuffled around once more with obvious determination before settling in to fall back asleep until-

“Tony!” Rhodey exclaimed as a small body crashed into his own, nestling itself right on top of his duvet. “Oh my god, why?”

“You were ignoring me,” Tony replied and it was easy to tell that he was pouting. “And I can’t sleep because there’s a question that’s bothering me.” He allowed Rhodey to turn so he was laying on his back and beamed down at him, doe eyes adorably wide and curls mussed beyond help. “It’s important.”

Rhodey couldn’t resist a soft groan of protest but his actions said otherwise as his arms came to lock around Tony’s waist. That pleased Tony thoroughly as he released something akin to a mewl and nuzzled into his warmth.

Goodness, he was lucky he was cute.

“Dude, it’s 3 am ,” Rhodey said, raising an eyebrow tiredly. “What the hell?”

“I was thinking about the creation of our universe,” Tony began and that was it as Rhodey had had enough. He proceeded to roll onto his side with Tony still in his arms, earning him a protesting squeak. “I wasn’t finished with my question!”

“Yes, you are,” Rhodey told him and held him close, his chin resting on top of Tony’s curls. “We can discuss in the morning. Goodnight, Tones.”

“But it’s important.” And Tony would never admit to that being a whine but Rhodey would forever fight him that it was. Though a yawn rounded out the words and Tony grumbled. “I may forget it in the morning.” But he was fading, that burst of energy slowly dissipating as tiredness dragged him to depths of sleep. 

“Goodnight.” Rhodey said once more and smiled at the sleep-slurred words he got in response. 

send me a prompt!

blog.name: lesbian-deadpool
blog.title: The world replied, "Fuck. There's two of them?!"
blog.description: | Gay | Mutant | How many Wades does it take, to replace a light bulb? Three. One to convince him to change it, one to bitch about it. And one to cause a blackout. Welcome to the madness. We hope you enjoy your stay. | Idk what half the things I post are either. | Everything I write is gay. Just is. | incorrect quote maniac/addict | Request me some things (Open) | Ground rules to requesting | Masterlist | Icon @ lesbiansassemble |

summary:
Tony: I can’t believe you and Natasha broke the bed last night!
Steve: Must have been a wild night.
Y/N: Haha... yeah...
(Last...
body:
Tony: I can’t believe you and Natasha broke the bed last night!

Steve: Must have been a wild night.

Y/N: Haha… yeah…

(Last night)

Y/N: Bet you can’t jump high enough to touch the ceiling!

Natasha: Try me.

title: Dance of Life
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2EaSXjl

by FawnoftheWoods

Steve has worked with teams before. But with his partner MIA, he is having a hard time melding well with this team. Phil and Natasha have an idea.
